html: It was a privilege to have Purdue's very own Dr. Kevin Solomon testify in the Subcommittee on Research & Technology yesterday. He addressed the vast potential in the bioeconomy and how continued support for engineering biology is driving innovation.pic.twitter.com/4CQ3F4tdEX
text: It was a privilege to have Purdue's very own Dr. Kevin Solomon testify in the Subcommittee on Research & Technology yesterday. He addressed the vast potential in the bioeconomy and how continued support for engineering biology is driving innovation.pic.twitter.com/4CQ3F4tdEX

html: Winter months bring harsh weather & unforeseeable challenges, but the endless dedication of farmers & ranchers overseeing their herds is what keeps our livestock industry thriving. Here’s to those who no matter the hour or temp help usher in the next generation. #NationalAgWeekpic.twitter.com/DooRs27FIi

html: Tomorrow in the board room of the West Lafayette Public Library from 12:00PM (ET) until 4:00PM (ET), Congressman Jim Baird’s community liaison will be available to help with constituent services and answer questions. Stop by and say hello.

html: It's been a great week representing Hoosiers from the 4th District. I spoke with the AgriInstitute Leadership Program and met with several constituents and businesses from the district. Here are just a few pictures from the week.pic.twitter.com/5anbzUART6

html: Informative visit with 1st Lt. John A. Keiper and the @IndianaCAP , which included the Rensselaer Cadet Squadron from our district! Thanks for spending time with us and sharing how you are positively impacting your communities.pic.twitter.com/YhsiWZhFWL

html: This afternoon, I met with farmers from all across our district to talk about the issues important to them. We spent a lot of time discussing infrastructure, trade and biofuels. #INCoffeeChatpic.twitter.com/MMj8ZsGwNe
text: This afternoon, I met with farmers from all across our district to talk about the issues important to them. We spent a lot of time discussing infrastructure, trade and biofuels. #INCoffeeChatpic.twitter.com/MMj8ZsGwNe

html: I’m a proud co-sponsor of H.R. 962, the Born Alive Abortion Survivors Protection Act. This would make it illegal to kill babies born alive after surviving an attempted abortion. Protecting the sanctity of life is something I will always fight for.pic.twitter.com/ymjyH8hBtF
text: I’m a proud co-sponsor of H.R. 962, the Born Alive Abortion Survivors Protection Act. This would make it illegal to kill babies born alive after surviving an attempted abortion. Protecting the sanctity of life is something I will always fight for.pic.twitter.com/ymjyH8hBtF

html: Great to spend time with acting Secretary Bernhardt, who recently was nominated to lead the Department of Interior. We discussed conservation and how Interior policies impact agriculture.pic.twitter.com/kAXzaTnzBa
text: Great to spend time with acting Secretary Bernhardt, who recently was nominated to lead the Department of Interior. We discussed conservation and how Interior policies impact agriculture.pic.twitter.com/kAXzaTnzBa

html: Today, our district team visited with Dr. Gary Friedman and his dental staff as they participated in Give Kids A Smile Day.
